synopsis.text: Takuya, a solitary courier with a strict adherence to his contracts, encounters Yuki, the lone remaining resident of a city that inexplicably vanished overnight. Guided by a cryptic message from Yuki's missing father, the unlikely duo embarks on a treacherous quest to unravel the enigma of the deserted city, now ominously dubbed "Lost." As they delve deeper into the mystery, they confront unexpected hurdles, uncovering a clandestine organization operating in the shadows and a web of concealed conspiracies. Amidst the turmoil, the pair forms a profound bond, unearthing the poignant sentiments of those left behind and inching closer to the truth behind the lost city.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
